name: LingvanexTranslator
0:
”Alexa, open Lingvanex Translator”
”Alexa, ask Lingvanex Translator how to say I love you in Russian?”
”Alexa, open Lingvanex Translator and start conversation in Spanish”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: lingvanex translator
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Lingvanex Translator Skill provides you with high-quality translation based on neural networks. 
Get translation of your conversation in real-time! 
Make your home truly smart!

FEATURES:
1) Conversation mode with real-time translation
Say sentence, then make a pause. Lingvanex Translator will immediately translate it into chosen language. Continue talking.

2) Voice translation to 50+ languages
Spanish, Hindi, Arabic, German, French, Russian and more.

3) Dictionary meaning
This feature works for the single words only. The assistant will give you word definition, alternate translations and synonyms. More than 50 languages available. 

4) For real Geeks! 
Use two Alexa-enabled devices for mutual translation in real-time.
For example,
You speak English, your friend speaks Spanish.
Activate Lingvanex Translator on both devices.
The first will translate from Spanish to English
The second will translate from English to Spanish.
Speak English or Spanish, the assistants will translate your conversation in real-time into both languages!
We erase language barriers!

Please get in touch with any suggestions or questions about this skill and how we can make it better for you: support@lingvanex.com
